title: You'll love our amazing community! Highly desirable neighborhood!
posting_body: ['Welcome home to Shadow Lake!', 'Located at:', '3515 Pleasantdale Rd.', 'Doraville, GA 30340', 'Rental Information:', '# of Bedrooms: 2', '# of Bathrooms:  1', 'Square Footage: 1200 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1553/month', 'Contact our leasing office at', 'show contact info', 'Shadow Lake Apartments is a great place to call "home".', 'Please contact us today for more information, or stop by so a member of our bi-lingual staff can show you around our community.', 'Community Features:', '● Business Center', '● Cable/Satellite Available', '● Central Air', '● Clubhouse', '● Dogs & Cats Welcome', '● Extended living room area', '● Fitness Center', '● Picnic Area with Grill', '● Smoke Free', '● Tennis Courts', '● Clothes Care Center', '● Lake on Site', '● Laundry Facilities', '● MARTA Access', '● Pet Care', '● Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '● Scenic Lake', '● Se Habla Espanol', '● Walking Distance to Pleasantdale Park', '● Wooded Views', 'Unit Features:', '● Air Conditioning', '● Breakfast Bar', '● Ceiling Fans', '● Dishwasher', '● Disposal', '● Patio/Balcony', '● Refrigerator/Ice Maker', '● Sunroom', '● Walk-In Closets', '● Cable/Satellite Available', '● Extended living room area', '● Fireplace in Select Units', '● Fully Equipped Kitchens', '● Hardwood Floors', '● High Speed Internet Access', '● In Unit Washer & Dryer', '● Upgrade Unit', '● Vaulted Ceilings in Select Units', '● Views', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'We accept 2 pets with a max weight of 50lbs.', 'and a pet fee of $300 and a monthly pet rent of $15.', 'Leasing Options:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Management:', 'Ventron Management', 'Admin Fee: $135', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '89F83FC5E4B0457']
